name: Monsters Vs Robots
description:
Monster Vs Robots is an early platformer prototype for Metroidvania Month 19.

Start in the forest, and work your way into the factory, unlocking doors and attacking enemies along the way.  The original plan was to have 3 'monster' forms that you can swap between, those are not currently included.

Controls :

W, S, A, D - Player movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Attack

R - Respawn

Created by: phopps, brt9029, thaewyn, and burcarz.
